original_text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem, when they had fulfilled their ministry, and took with them John, whose surname was Mark.
korean_text: 바나바와 사울이 부조하는 일을 마치고 마가라 하는 요한을 데리고 예루살렘에서 돌아오니라

sentences.original_text: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem
when they had fulfilled their ministry
